name: Aspect
long_description:
When footage comes off a camera, media content teams spend hours organizing their project, syncing across business tools, assembling rough drafts, reviewing for changes, and sending the right links to the right people and stakeholders.

Aspect is an AI platform that understands a teamâ€™s video library and business workflows better than humans. The platform automates the entire enterprise production process, so  instead of managing corporate back-office tasks, creatives can focus on what they love while companies achieve higher ROI on their content.
one_liner: AI platform for enterprise media content
